column5: Crazy quick melt with this warm weather. Surface temp at the dock on north Pigeon 50F in pm.
A boat was running around Clear Lake yesterday towing a water skier, mind you he was wearing a wetsuit but still a gutsy move LOL
Where did you get the image from?
Google “satellite image Great Lakes.” Click on Lake Ontario.  	Gives multiple images per day every time satellite goes over. Sometimes there’s cloud cover.
Modis Great Lakes Imagery is what you want.
